Class JDBCScheduleDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.sci.db.JDBCScheduleDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDAO<Schedule>

    public class JDBCScheduleDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseDAO<Schedule>
    This class is used for creating a connection to the database, and for data manipulation.
    Author:
    Sandor Naghi
